workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Administer Oracle Database 23c with Oracle Enterprise Manager

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on administering Oracle Database from Oracle Enterprise Manager (Oracle EM).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup compute instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: View container details from SQL command line
tutorials.description: How to view container details from SQL command line.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Manage targets - Oracle Database and Listener
tutorials.description: How to manage targets, Oracle Database and Listener, using Oracle EM.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Access container home page
tutorials.description: How to access container home page from Oracle EM.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
